Plot: Okinawa is famous for having one of the healthiest population in the world with the longest lifespan. This world record is supported by scientific studies conducted over the years. Centenarians express a high satisfaction level with their lives.. Okinawans know what it means to live a long and healthy lifespan. The book provides a great deal of history about the culture of Okinawa. Okinawa is one of the healthiest places in the world and one where people have the longest lifespans. The book provides a guideline for getting the most out of their lives. Readers don't find a hard time reading this book and it was very easy to understand by everyone, young or old.
